website.bodytext: I'm Sean Flanagan, a video game designer and artist from Atlanta currently getting my B.S. in Computational Media from Georgia Tech. For years, I've loved making games and the#art that goes inside of them.##As Vice President of VGDev, Georgia Tech's video game development club, I oversee and facilitate the development of 5-7 student-led game projects per semester.

Analog Dreams is a three-hour first-person puzzle platformer inspired by games like Portal and Quantum Conundrum, which I created during my second semester in VGDev with a group of friends. ##As one of the game's two project leads, I personally artpassed and lit all 20 of the final environments, as well as modeling many of the props and creating all of the sounds.
